name: Outro
commands: Huff... Whew!|They're really making me sweat...|We need to get to Grahment quickly... But we need to go through Monsdor to do it.|I don't think it'll be easy, but we have to push onward.
Did I happen to hear you say Grahment?

Oh! Sorry! Sorry!|I am Blazing, son of Count Ignatius of Grahment...|I was supposed to be on my way to Aurelia but...|Well, my sense of direction is awful!|The Goddess did not heed my prayers no matter how much I tried...|Now I am late to see the post-coronation festivities...
I see, sure, coronation... Sure, we'll help you back to Grahment.
Oh thank you so much!|My father would be besides himself if anything were to happen to me.|Oh! I never asked your name?
Oh, I see. On your way home and wanted a stay in Grahment first?|I must say, good choice!|Now let's hurry!
Hm, saving the son of a Count?|This could definitely help us call in a few favors!
Quite, but best to not let the kid catch on.
Right you are, commander.|Now, let me clean that sword...
W-well, it IS covered in Aurelian blood...|Might look less than admirable to the young sir and his religious side.
Right, good thinking greenie.|Now let's go on!
Your Highness, no. Your Majesty, now?
Sir Argento has dealt with the... burial.
Right...|Now I am Queen, yet all I can do is hide in my room...
Know that Monsdor will grant you its full support.|We too know the desecration of life that has occured here today... is unholy.
I will do whatever it takes to expunge those Arcein scum...|They alluded me...|GAH! I cannot believe I failed...
You are too merciful, your Majesty.|You're the image of the Goddess's grace.
In other news, it seems Cres of Grahment was very... chummy with the intruder...
Trying to convince us of Lord Sages' innocence...|Thinking a fool of me... I can see through their blaspehmy.
Already sorted.|I know they will attempt to pass through Monsdor, if they are allied with Grahment.|They will be sorely surprised with what awaits them.
I have dealt with that.|I have eyes and ears tracking them.
I best take my leave...|I wish you the best... and my condolences...
It appears we need to steel ourselves for a war...|No... exacting justice, right your Majesty?
Why the troubled face, your Majesty?
Father Cornelius! How could you be so careless?!
Remember, iron heart.|Arcei is but a sacrilegious rodent, tarnishing the Goddess's world.
The Goddess couldn't have stopped this madness herself?|Allowing for Elias to-
Hold your tongue.|You know she has no corporeal form to obstruct our free will.|Her plan lives through the light, which we must follow.
...|Now, I must get to mobilising a squad, Arcei will rue the day they killed Elias...
You trust him?|He appears to have strayed from the Goddess's path.
I know that he will do as I say.|Though I too find it harder to believe in her every day, father Cornelius.
Doubt can only cloud your judgement.|I am afraid one who wields the authority you do should not be so blind.
Remember Cornelius, I am the Queen now.|You cannot speak to me that way.
My apologies, my ferver for the Goddess trumps even my devotion to you.|I'm sure you can understand seeking a higher goal.
source:
transition;close
remove_tag;Skill;Boss
remove_all_units
music;Tension
change_background;Forest 6 Day
transition;Open
add_portrait;Sal;Right
speak;Sal;Huff... Whew!|They're really making me sweat...|We need to get to Grahment quickly... But we need to go through Monsdor to do it.|I don't think it'll be easy, but we have to push onward.
add_portrait;Blazing;Left
speak;Blazing;Did I happen to hear you say Grahment?
bop_portrait;Sal
speak;Sal;Ah! Who are you?!
bop_portrait;Blazing
speak;Blazing;Oh! Sorry! Sorry!|I am Blazing, son of Count Ignatius of Grahment...|I was supposed to be on my way to Aurelia but...|Well, my sense of direction is awful!|The Goddess did not heed my prayers no matter how much I tried...|Now I am late to see the post-coronation festivities...
speak;Sal;I see, sure, coronation... Sure, we'll help you back to Grahment.
speak;Blazing;Oh thank you so much!|My father would be besides himself if anything were to happen to me.|Oh! I never asked your name?
speak;Sal;Erm, Sal...|Of Arcei.
speak;Blazing;Oh, I see. On your way home and wanted a stay in Grahment first?|I must say, good choice!|Now let's hurry!
remove_portrait;Blazing
speak;Sal;Hm, saving the son of a Count?|This could definitely help us call in a few favors!
if;game.check_alive('Maro')
    add_portrait;Maro;FarRight
    speak;Maro;I see, ma'am... How shrewd!
    speak;Sal;Quite, but best to not let the kid catch on.
    speak;Maro;Right you are, commander.|Now, let me clean that sword...
    speak;Sal;Why?
    speak;Maro;W-well, it IS covered in Aurelian blood...|Might look less than admirable to the young sir and his religious side.
    speak;Sal;Right, good thinking greenie.|Now let's go on!
    speak;Maro;Forward, march!
    multi_remove_portrait;Sal;Maro
end
end_skip
transition;Close

speak;Oberon;Your Highness, no. Your Majesty, now?
speak;Cornelius;Sir Argento has dealt with the... burial.
speak;Emeline;Right...|Now I am Queen, yet all I can do is hide in my room...
speak;Oberon;Know that Monsdor will grant you its full support.|We too know the desecration of life that has occured here today... is unholy.
speak;Skill;I will do whatever it takes to expunge those Arcein scum...|They alluded me...|GAH! I cannot believe I failed...
speak;Cornelius;A failure it was, indeed.
speak;Emeline;It's alright, father Cornelius.|He tried...
speak;Skill;You are too merciful, your Majesty.|You're the image of the Goddess's grace.
speak;Emeline;...
speak;Cornelius;In other news, it seems Cres of Grahment was very... chummy with the intruder...
speak;Emeline;Trying to convince us of Lord Sages' innocence...|Thinking a fool of me... I can see through their blaspehmy.
speak;Oberon;Already sorted.|I know they will attempt to pass through Monsdor, if they are allied with Grahment.|They will be sorely surprised with what awaits them.
speak;Emeline;As for Cres...
speak;Cornelius;I have dealt with that.|I have eyes and ears tracking them.
speak;Oberon;I best take my leave...|I wish you the best... and my condolences...
speak;Emeline;Farewell...

speak;Emeline;Elias...|So much blood.
speak;Skill;Father Cornelius! How could you be so careless?!
speak;Emeline;I-it's okay...
speak;Cornelius;Remember, iron heart.|Arcei is but a sacrilegious rodent, tarnishing the Goddess's world.
speak;Emeline;Yes, of course, you're right.
speak;Skill;The Goddess couldn't have stopped this madness herself?|Allowing for Elias to-
speak;Cornelius;Hold your tongue.|You know she has no corporeal form to obstruct our free will.|Her plan lives through the light, which we must follow.

speak;Emeline;Remember Cornelius, I am the Queen now.|You cannot speak to me that way.
speak;Cornelius;My apologies, my ferver for the Goddess trumps even my devotion to you.|I'm sure you can understand seeking a higher goal.
speak;Emeline;Indeed...
